text: The St. Clairsville-Richland City School District serves St. Clairsville, Ohio and the surrounding areas. == Board of education == * Michael Jacob, President * Michael Fador, Vice President * Amy Porter, Treasurer * James Cook * Pamela Jones * Bill Zanders * Walter E. title: St. Clairsville-Richland City School District
